SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.util
Class HardMacroGenerator

java.lang.Object
  edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.util.HardMacroGenerator

public class HardMacroGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

This class reads an XDL design file and converts it to a hard macro. It will also create a VHDL wrapper to be able to instance the hard macro with the original interface of the design.

Author:
Chris Lavin Created on: Jan 27, 2010 Rewritten on: Jun 16 2010 by Jaren Lamprecht

Nested Class Summary

          directions for finding slices

HardMacroGenerator

public HardMacroGenerator(Design design)
Constructor

Method Detail

convertToHardMacro

public Design convertToHardMacro(java.lang.String vhdName)
The main function which will convert XDL_Design design to a hard macro.

Parameters:
vhdName - The output file name, used to generate the VHDL wrapper file name.
Returns:
The newly created hard macro.

handleSHAPE

public void handleSHAPE()
This function removes the shape attributes from instances since adding several HMs to a design results with the duplicate shape names.

handleIOLOGIC

public void handleIOLOGIC()
This function is questionable in its necessity as ILOGIC and OLOGIC primitives could be part of a hard macro. We are assuming that they were not intentional.

handleNets

private void handleNets()
This is a helper method to convertToHardMacro which iterates through the nets to turn the design into a hard macro

handleIOSERDES

private void handleIOSERDES()
This is a helper method to converToHardMacro which removes the ISERDES and OSERDES

handleTIEOFFS

private void handleTIEOFFS()
This is a helper method to convertToHardMacro which replaces the TIEOFFS or their equivalent if mapped to a slice

hmErrorCheck

private void hmErrorCheck()
Checks the hard macro for errors such as unsupported instances, duplicates, etc.

isNetOutputofBUFG

private Pin isNetOutputofBUFG(Net net)
A helper method which checks if the net is driven by a BUFG.

Parameters:
net - The net to test.
Returns:
The pin that is the driving the net if driven by a BUFG, null otherwise.

isNetConnectedToDCMOrPMV

private Pin isNetConnectedToDCMOrPMV(Net net)
A helper method to check if a net connects to the un-needed DCM/PMV stuff.

Parameters:
net - The net to check.
Returns:
The pin connected to a DCM or PMV.

isNetConnectedToIOB

private java.util.ArrayList<Pin> isNetConnectedToIOB(Net net)
Returns a list of pins that are connected to IOBs in the current net.

Parameters:
net - The net to test for IOB connections.
Returns:
A list of pins connected to IOBs, the list will be empty if the net does not connect to IOBs.

isPinConnectedToIOB

private boolean isPinConnectedToIOB(Pin pin)
A helper function to isNetConnectedToIOB which tests if a pin is connected to an IOB.

Parameters:
pin - The pin to test.
Returns:
True if the pin is connected to an IOB, false otherwise.

handleIOBs

private void handleIOBs(Net net,
                        java.util.ArrayList<Pin> pins)
A helper method to convertToHardMacro() which handles the cases of the nets being connected to IOBs.

Parameters:
net - The current net to convert.
pins - The pins that are connected to IOBs.

handlePassThruIOBs

private void handlePassThruIOBs(Net net,
                                java.util.ArrayList<Pin> pins)
Inserts a LUT to isolate input and output IOBs. This is a restriction of hard macros.

Parameters:
net - The current net to convert.
pins - The pins that are connected to IOBs.

placeStaticSlice

private void placeStaticSlice(Instance slice,
                              boolean updateName)
This function will look at already taken SLICE locations and try to place the slice in a vacant location next to one of the already occupied slices. This is only for static slices.

Parameters:
slice - The slice to be placed.

createStaticSliceSource

private Instance createStaticSliceSource(NetType netType)
This function will create an new SLICEL that will drive a static 0 or 1 indicated by the type

Parameters:
netType - Valid types are "gnd" and "vcc"
Returns:
The newly create instance

createPassThruSlice

private Instance createPassThruSlice()
Creates a slice for a signal to pass through

Returns:
the slice

isTriState

public boolean isTriState(Instance instance)
Returns true if the given IOB is a tri-state buffer

Parameters:
instance -
Returns:
True if tri-state

createVHDLWrapper

private void createVHDLWrapper()
This function will create the VHDL wrapper based on the hard macro created and the different special cases that have changed the interface because of Xilinx hard macro restrictions.

isBusName

private boolean isBusName(java.lang.String name,
                          java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> map)
A helper function that can take in a string and determine if it is a member of a bus. If it is a bus it will populate the variables _busName and _busBitNumber based in the name. Otherwise it sets those variables to null and -1 respectively.

Parameters:
name - Name of the string to check for a bus name
map - The map of all the bus names already found.
Returns:
True if name is a bus name, false otherwise.

failAndExit

public static void failAndExit(java.lang.String s)
A simple error function to reduce code size.

Parameters:
s - The error string

failGracefully

public void failGracefully(java.lang.String s)
For designs with detected unsupported structures

Parameters:
s -

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
